detail_desc: Gently flared, sleeveless top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathers at the top and narrow shoulder straps with tie details.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in woven fabric with adjustable straps that cross at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and elastication at the sides. Unlined. Short-sleeved jersey top.

Shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and frayed, lace-trimmed hems.
